attributes.action: change the British national anthem to 'Rule Britannia'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are a few petitions to change the ENGILSH national anthem from the current 'God save the Queen' which is great except people are fogetting theat it is still the BRITISH national anthem.

This should be changed to something patriatic and generally not rubbish - 'Rule Britannia' - a poem by James Thomson and set to music by Thomas Arne in 1740.

It is well known, rousing, patriotic, bold, tuneful, inclusive to all Britons and booshank.

'God save the Queen' can be kept as the Commonwealth anthem that's ok.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
